dc:title: Day After Day - March 1939
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes a mission being preached in a nearby Church. Feels love for the poor ones in attendance seeing them as brothers of Christ. Explains why she prays for those who have committed suicide. Makes an appeal for funds.
